sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { GrGithub } from 'react-icons/gr' import { FaDribbble, FaTwitter } from 'react-icons/fa' import * as S from './styles' import { Author } from 'types/api' const icons = { twitter: , github: , dribbble: } const ProfileCard: React.FC = ({ name, role, photo, socialLinks, description }) => ( {name} {role} {socialLinks.map((item) => ( {icons[item.slug]} ))} {description} ) export default ProfileCard
